<Link id="l01956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1956"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are no entry points, we need the Linkage capability.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1957"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/spirvmoduleanalysis/#a05886598201aad1f7d78d80510ea352c">MAI</a>.MS&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/#a2cef054c0c3ca62b709eb640501e0d1baea37977cca9860f19a9776b4ad6e8db9">SPIRV::MB&#95;EntryPoints</a>&#93;.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1958"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/spirvmoduleanalysis/#a05886598201aad1f7d78d80510ea352c">MAI</a>.Reqs.addCapability(SPIRV::Capability::Linkage);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1959"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set maximum ID used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1961"><span class="doxyHighlight">  GR-&gt;setBound(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/spirvmoduleanalysis/#a05886598201aad1f7d78d80510ea352c">MAI</a>.MaxID);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1962"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1963"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
